name: Carrot&Islands
storyline:
The small town of Fangbox Island is originally a quiet and peaceful small town. The town is square, the buildings are square, even people and tricky animals are square... Only the sky and their only crop, carrots, are not square.

"I don't want to eat carrots anymore!!!" A villager threw the carrot in his hand to the sky. Suddenly, a group of very strange monsters appeared, and they quickly snatched all the carrots.

And our protagonist is a small... Monster (for the people in town) who has just made his debut after tracking these monsters here...
summary: Take up the weapon in your hand and defeat the little monster who snatched the carrot. Grab the carrots from the town and eat them yourself in Carrot&Islands, an indie action-adventure simulator.
